titleStmt.title: An apology for the Contemplations on the life and glory of Holy Mary mother of Jesus Shewing, the innocency, equity and antiquity, of the honour and veneration given to the blessed virgin mother by the Holy Catholick Church. By J.C. D.D. With allowance of superiours.
titleStmt.author: Cross, John, 1630-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Nath. Thompson at the entrance into Old Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
